title: Welcome
description: Happy to open the 'News' section of my brand new website.
contents:
Welcome; I’m happy to open my brand-new website’s
“News” section. Here you’ll find news about recently published articles,
new positions, and scientific and lab actualities.




          





While introducing my website, I want to give credit where credit is due
by citing several resources I used myself to build and customize my own
website using Distill for R
Markdown.







After a first look to the
Distill for R Markdown
tutorial webpage, one of the most useful resources I used is the
The Distillery, which
contains a nice
showcase that
can be explored to find some inspiration, but also a great
Tips &
tricks section where you can find many ways to customize or add new
features to your own blog or website.







Also, the blogs of Ella Kaye,
Danielle Navarro,
John Paul Helveston and
Tom Mock contain much advice to
improve the appearance and add several functionalities to your Distill
blog or website.







Finally, it is possible to customize website’s style by using icons and
animals silhouette using internet libraries such as
Font Awesome,
Academicons and
Phylopic or by embedding
Altmetric and
Dimension badges to
your publication record.
